title: 3M Peltor Optime 105 Earmuffs (Hard Hat Attached)
body:
Features:

    -  Double-Shell Technology: This design enhances noise reduction compared to single-shell earmuffs.
    -  High Noise Reduction: Likely offers a higher Noise Reduction Rating (NRR) compared to previously mentioned Optime™ 98 models (around 23 dB). The exact NRR isn't mentioned, but the description suggests it's suitable for time-weighted average (TWA) noise exposures up to 105 dBA (which is quite loud).
    -  Cap-Mount Design: Attaches directly to hard hats, providing a secure and hands-free solution for hard-hat-wearing workers.
    -  Hearing Protection Focus: The description emphasizes its effectiveness in mitigating the harmful effects of noise, suggesting it prioritizes high noise reduction.

Possible Applications:

    -  High-Noise Environments: Construction sites with loud machinery, workshops with power tools, or any situation with TWA noise exposure up to 105 dBA.

Additional Information:

    -  Cap-Mount Design: This design limits use to situations where a hard hat is also worn. It might not be suitable for tasks where hard hats are not required.

Price: ₹ SKU: Stock: instock Type: simple Categories: Ear Plugs and Ear Muffs Attributes: [] Variations: None

title: 3M Peltor Optime 105 Over-the-Head Earmuffs (H10A): High Noise Reduction Comfort
body:
Features:

High Noise Reduction:

    -  Suitable for time-weighted average (TWA) noise exposures up to 105 dBA (very loud).
    -  Double-shell technology and added mass/volume enhance noise reduction at various frequencies compared to single-shell designs.
    -  Over-the-Head Design: Versatile design that fits over the head and around the ears.

Durable Stainless Steel Headband:

    -  Resists bending and warping for extended use and durability.
    -  May offer a secure fit due to the strong headband material.
    -  Low-Pressure Fit: Aims for comfort during extended wear by distributing pressure evenly around the ears.

Possible Applications:

    -  High-Noise Environments: Construction sites with loud machinery, workshops with power tools, airports, or any situation with TWA noise exposure up to 105 dBA.

Additional Information:

    -  Over-the-Head Design: This design might be more comfortable for some users compared to cap-mounted earmuffs, especially for those who don't wear hard hats regularly.

title: 3M™ - Filter Retainer - 501
body:
The 3M 501 Filter Retainer will allow for a 3M 5000 Series Particulate Filter to be combined with a 3M 6000 Series Gas and Vapor Filter. This combination will offer comprehensive protection against airborne particles, gases and vapors. This 3M respirator filter retainer 501 is suitable for use with both half and full face masks and is super easy to snap into position over the filter.

Price: ₹ SKU: Stock: instock Type: simple Categories: Mask Filters, Masks Attributes: [] Variations: None

title: 3M™ - Particulate Filter 5N11, - N95
body:
3M™ Particulate Filter 5N11 are designed to be easily replaced for a cost effective solution. Use 3M™ Particulate Filters 5000 Series with 3M™ Gas/Vapor Cartridges and the 3M™ 5N11 filter to help filter certain particulates including dusts, mists, fibers, and metal fumes in addition to a broad range of gases and vapors. Or, use these filters with 3M™ Filter Adapter 603 and the 3M™ Filter 5N11 to help reduce particulate exposures only. These filters are easy to install, requiring minimal training. Plus, the 3M™ Particulate Filters 5000 Series are compatible with 3M™ Half Facepieces 6000, 6500/6500QL, 7500 Series, Full Facepieces 6000, FF-400, 7800 Series, 3M™ Scott™ AV-3000 HT and AV-3000 SureSeal Facepieces with AV-632 Bayonet Adapter, thus helping to reduce inventory needs.

Price: ₹ SKU: Stock: instock Type: simple Categories: Mask Filters, Masks Attributes: [] Variations: None

title: 3M™ - Particulate Filter 2097/07184(AAD), - P100
body:
The 3M™ Particulate Filters 2000 Series are made with electrostatic media to enhance the capture of airborne particles and reduce breathing resistance. These particulate filters are flame resistant and easy to install. NIOSH-approved P100 Particulate Filter for respiratory protection against certain oil and non-oil based particulates.

title: 3M™ - Organic Vapor/Acid Gas Cartridge - 6003
body:
The 3M 6003/07047 Organic Vapor/Acid Gas Cartridge helps provide organic vapor and acid gas protection in a variety of environments. When properly used with an approved 3M respirator properly fitted, this respirator cartridge helps provide respiratory protection from certain organic vapors, chlorine, hydrogen chloride, sulfur dioxide, chlorine dioxide, hydrogen sulfide, or hydrogen fluoride. The cartridge may be used for vapor concentrations up to 10 times the Permissible Exposure Limit (PEL) with half facepieces or 50 times PEL with quantitatively fit tested full facepieces.

Price: ₹ SKU: Stock: instock Type: simple Categories: Mask Filters, Personal Protective Equipment Attributes: [] Variations: None

title: 3M™ - Multi Gas/Vapor Cartridge - 6006
body:
3M™ Multi Gas/Vapor Cartridge 6006 works with 3M™ Half and Full Facepieces 6000, 7000 and FF-400 Series with bayonet holders or 3M™ Scott™ AV-3000 HT and AV-3000 SureSeal facepieces with 3M™ Scott™ AV-632 Bayonet Adapter. The cartridge is NIOSH (National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health) approved for environments containing certain organic vapors, chlorine, hydrogen chloride, chlorine dioxide, sulfur dioxide, hydrogen sulfide, ammonia, methylamine, formaldehyde or hydrogen fluoride. The cartridge has been assigned the color code “olive” in the NIOSH system.

NIOSH approved for protection against certain organic vapors, acid gases, ammonia, methylamine and formaldehyde.

title: 3M™ - Half Facepiece Reusable Respirator - Mask - 6200
body:
3M™ Half Facepiece Reusable Respirator 6200, Made from lightweight materials, the 3M™ Half Facepiece Reusable Respirator 6000 Series offers comfort, convenience, and protection from certain airborne contaminants when paired with approved 3M cartridges and filters. Use with 3M™ Filters 2000 Series, 3M™ Filter 7093, P100, 3M™ Cartridges 6000 Series, or 3M™ Dual Airline Systems provide protection against particulates and a wide variety of gases and vapors according to NIOSH approvals.

Price: ₹ SKU: Stock: instock Type: simple Categories: Masks Attributes: [] Variations: None

title: 3M™ - Full Facepiece Reusable Respirator - Mask - 6800
body:
Comfortable, adaptable, and dependable, 3M has your face covered.

The 6000 Series full facepiece respirator is crafted from lightweight, yet durable materials and features a soft silicone faceseal that conforms to the wearer’s face, along with a wide lens for visibility and eye protection.

Equipped with our proprietary 3M™ Cool Flow™ Valve and a unique center adapter that directs exhaled breath and moisture downward while reducing the occurrence of dirt and debris collecting in the valve.

This 3M full face mask 6800 medium is compatible with a wide range of 3M filters, cartridges, powered and supplied air systems making it a go-to choice for safety managers.

3M provides a full line of reusable respirators to help meet the needs of most work environments. Half or full facepiece reusable respirators can help provide respiratory protection against both particles and/or certain gases/vapors.

Price: ₹ SKU: Stock: instock Type: simple Categories: Masks Attributes: [] Variations: None

title: Ansell AlphaTec® 56-101: Heavy-Duty PVC Apron for Chemical & Abrasion Protection
body:
Ansell AlphaTec 56-101 PVC Apron: Heavy-Duty Protection for Work & Safety

Overview:

The Ansell AlphaTec 56-101 is a heavy-duty white PVC apron designed for personal protection in various industrial and messy work environments.

  • Key Features:
    • Superior Protection: Made from 18-mil thick die-cut PVC fabric, this apron offers excellent resistance against chemical splashes, punctures, and abrasions.
    • Comfortable Fit: The adjustable 48-inch ties and sealed grommets ensure a comfortable and secure fit for most body types.
    • Durable Construction: The vinyl construction provides long-lasting wear and tear resistance, making it a reliable choice for repeated use.

 

  • Applications:
    • Industrial work environments
    • Chemical handling
    • Food processing
    • Manufacturing
    • Janitorial and maintenance work
    • And other applications requiring protection from splashes, punctures, and abrasions

 

  • Benefits:
    • Enhanced safety for workers handling hazardous materials
    • Improved worker comfort and mobility
    • Increased productivity due to reduced risk of injury or contamination
    • Cost-effective solution for long-lasting protection

 

Note: This apron may not be suitable for all applications. Always consult the Ansell product information and safety data sheets (SDS) for specific chemical resistance and appropriate use guidelines.

Price: ₹ SKU: Stock: instock Type: simple Categories: Labcoat and Apron Attributes: [] Variations: None

title: Ansell AlphaTec® 56-100: Heavy-Duty Green PVC Apron for Chemical & Abrasion Protection
body:
Ansell AlphaTec 56-100 PVC Apron: Heavy-Duty Green Guardian

Overview:

The Ansell AlphaTec 56-100 is a heavy-duty green PVC apron designed for comprehensive personal protection in various industrial and messy work environments.

  • Key Features:
    • Broad Spectrum Safeguard: The 18-mil thick die-cut PVC fabric effectively shields against chemical splashes, punctures, abrasions, acids, and bases, offering a wider range of protection compared to the white version (56-101).
    • Comfortable & Secure Fit: Similar to the white model, adjustable 48-inch ties with sealed grommets ensure a comfortable and secure fit for most body types.
    • Durable & Flexible: The vinyl construction provides long-lasting wear and tear resistance while maintaining flexibility for ease of movement.

 

  • Applications:
    • Industrial work environments involving a wider range of chemicals (check Ansell's SDS for specific resistances)
    • Chemical handling (acids & bases)
    • Food processing
    • Manufacturing
    • Janitorial and maintenance work
    • And other applications requiring protection from splashes, punctures, abrasions, acids, and bases

 

  • Benefits:
    • Enhanced safety for workers handling various hazardous materials
    • Improved worker comfort and mobility
    • Increased productivity due to reduced risk of injury or contamination
    • Cost-effective solution for long-lasting protection

 

  • Choosing Between Green (56-100) and White (56-101):
    • If your primary concern is defense against acids, bases, and a broader range of chemicals, the green Ansell AlphaTec 56-100 offers superior protection.
    • If chemical resistance is less critical, and you prefer a lighter-colored apron, the white Ansell AlphaTec 56-101 might be suitable.

 

Note: Always consult the Ansell product information and safety data sheets (SDS) for specific chemical resistance and appropriate use guidelines.

Price: ₹ SKU: Stock: instock Type: simple Categories: Labcoat and Apron Attributes: [] Variations: None

title: Ansell HyFlex 11-840: Durable & Comfortable Multi-Purpose Gloves
body:
This description highlights a pair of industrial gloves designed for enhanced durability, grip, and comfort. Here's a breakdown of the key features and benefits:

  • Abrasion Resistance and Grip (FORTIX™ Technology):
    • 2x More Grip: This technology claims to offer double the grip compared to standard industrial gloves, improving handling and control in work environments.
    •  Up to 20% More Durability: The gloves are advertised to last longer and resist wear and tear better than standard options, reducing replacement needs.

 

  • Ergonomic Design (ERGOFORM™ Technology):
    • Reduced Strain: This design aims to minimize hand and arm fatigue during extended wear, promoting worker comfort and potentially improving productivity.

 

  • Comfort (ZONZ™ Comfort Fit Technology):
    • Breathable Comfort: The gloves are designed to allow airflow and prevent sweat build-up, keeping hands cooler and more comfortable during use.

 

  • Overall:
    • These gloves could be a good option for various industrial applications where workers need a combination of Durability, Grip, and Comfort. The FORTIX™ technology promises enhanced performance in these areas.

title: Ansell HyFlex 11-801: Breathable & Comfortable Multi-Purpose Gloves
body:
Industrial Safety Gloves with Enhanced Comfort and Durability

This description details a pair of industrial safety gloves designed for comfort and practicality in dirty or oily environments. Here's a breakdown of the key features and benefits:

  • Darker Liner:
    • Benefit: Masks dirt and oil, reducing the need for frequent cleaning and improving glove aesthetics.
    •  Possible Consideration: Darker colors might not offer high visibility in some workplaces where that's a safety requirement.

 

  • Breathable Nitrile Coating (30% Greater Breathability):
    • Benefit: Improves comfort during extended wear by allowing better airflow and minimizing sweat build-up. Nitrile coating also offers good abrasion and puncture resistance for various industrial applications.

 

  • ZONZ™ Comfort Fit Technology:
    • Benefit: Reduces hand fatigue and improves overall wearability through a comfortable, ergonomic design.

 

  • Possible Applications:

These gloves could be suitable for various industrial tasks involving:

    •  Dirty or oily environments: The dark liner helps mask dirt, and the nitrile coating offers some resistance to oils and chemicals (check specific resistance levels for your application).
    • Assembly and handling: The breathable comfort and dexterity might be beneficial for tasks requiring good grip and control.

title: Ansell HyFlex 11-727: Cut-Resistant & Flexible Work Gloves for Precision Tasks
body:
Ultralight Abrasion-Resistant Gloves: Detailed Breakdown

This description highlights a pair of ultralight gloves designed for abrasion resistance while offering comfort and dexterity. Here's a breakdown of the key features and benefits:

  • Comfort and Dexterity:
    • Lightweight Fabric and Seamless Liner: This combination aims to provide a close, comfortable fit with good flexibility, mimicking a bare hand feel.

 

  • Abrasion Resistance:
    • Certified Durability: The gloves are advertised to have EN level 4 and ANSI level 6 abrasion resistance. These are high abrasion resistance ratings, indicating the gloves can withstand significant wear and tear.

 

  • Cut Resistance (INTERCEPT™ Technology):
    • Ensuring Workplace Safety: The description mentions cut resistance technology, but the specific level isn't mentioned.

 

  • Overall:

These gloves could be a good option for various tasks requiring:

    • High Abrasion Protection: Tasks involving frequent contact with rough or abrasive surfaces. The EN and ANSI level ratings indicate significant abrasion resistance.
    • Comfort and Dexterity: The lightweight fabric and seamless liner aim to provide a comfortable fit with good finger movement, important for tasks requiring precision handling.

title: Ansell HyFlex 11-618: Ultra-Thin & Dexterous Work Gloves for Precision Tasks
body:
Ultra-Thin Polyurethane Gloves for Delicate Handling

This description highlights a pair of ultra-thin polyurethane (PU) gloves designed for tasks requiring precise handling and dexterity. Here's a breakdown of the key features and benefits:

  • Dexterity and Tactility:
    • Light 18-Gauge Design: This refers to the thickness of the material, with 18-gauge indicating a very thin and flexible design. This allows for a high degree of finger movement and tactile sensitivity, mimicking a bare hand feel.
    • Thin PU Coating: The PU coating adds a layer of protection while maintaining a close, comfortable fit and good finger dexterity.

 

  • Other Features:
    • Dark Nylon Liner: This can help mask dirt and stains, potentially extending the usable life of the gloves before needing cleaning. However, dark colors might not be ideal for high-visibility applications.

 

  • Possible Applications:

These gloves could be suitable for various tasks requiring:

    • Precision Handling: Assembly, electronics work, small part handling, or other tasks requiring good finger movement and tactile sensitivity.
    • Minimal Protection: These gloves prioritize dexterity over heavy-duty protection. They might offer some abrasion and dirt protection, but not suitable for tasks with high cut, heat, or chemical hazards.

title: Ansell HyFlex 11-518: Barehand Feel & Cut Protection for Precision Tasks
body:
Ultralight Cut-Resistant PU Gloves: Detailed Breakdown

This description highlights a pair of ultralight polyurethane (PU) gloves designed for a balance of dexterity, cut protection, and abrasion resistance. Here's a breakdown of the key features and benefits:

  • Comfort and Dexterity:
    • Ultralight seamless liner: This design aims to provide a close, comfortable fit that feels like a bare hand, allowing for good finger movement and tactility.

 

  • Cut Protection:
    •  Dyneema® Diamond Technology: This technology is known for offering excellent cut resistance. The description mentions achieving EN ISO B and ANSI A2 cut protection levels. While not the highest levels, they can provide significant protection against cuts from sharp objects.

 

  • Abrasion Resistance:
    • Durable PU coating: The PU coating offers a layer of protection against abrasion and wear and tear. The description mentions EN and ANSI level 3 abrasion resistance, indicating moderate protection.

 

  • Overall:

These gloves could be a good option for various tasks requiring a balance of features:

    • Dexterity and Tactility: The thin liner allows for good finger movement and a close feel for precise handling.
    • Cut Protection: The Dyneema® technology offers significant cut resistance compared to bare hands or basic gloves.
    • Abrasion Resistance: The PU coating provides moderate protection against wear and tear from rough surfaces.

title: Ansell HyFlex 11-425: Durable & Cut-Resistant Gloves for Abrasive & Dry Environments
body:
Abrasion-Resistant Gloves with Color-Coded Application System

This description highlights a pair of abrasion-resistant gloves with a color-coding system to help users choose the right protection for the job. Here's a breakdown of the key features and benefits:

  • Color-Coded Application System (HyFlex® indicator system):
    • This system likely uses different colors on the gloves to indicate the level of Abrasion Resistance or the Appropriate Application.
    • Benefit: This can help workers easily identify the correct gloves for a specific task, improving safety compliance and reducing the risk of using inadequate protection.

 

  • Abrasion Resistance:
    • Certified Abrasion Resistance: The description mentions certified abrasion resistance, but the specific level (e.g., EN or ANSI) isn't provided.

 

  • Grip and Comfort:
    • Water-Based PU and Nitrile Coating: This combination can offer a good balance of grip, comfort, and abrasion resistance.
    • PU (polyurethane) coating provides Flexibility and Dexterity.
    • Nitrile coating enhances grip, especially in wet or oily environments.
    • Note: Water-based PU coatings might be more breathable than solvent-based ones, potentially improving comfort during extended wear.

 

  • Overall:
    • These gloves could be a good option for various tasks requiring abrasion protection, with the color-coding system aiding in choosing the appropriate level for the job.

body:
Black PU-Coated Multipurpose Gloves: Breakdown for Light-Duty Handling

This description details black, PU-coated gloves designed for comfort and light-duty handling tasks. Here's a breakdown of the key features and benefits:

  • Protection and Durability:
    • PU (Polyurethane) Coating: PU coating offers some protection against abrasion, wear and tear.

title: Ansell Edge 48-706: Cut-Resistant & Durable Gloves for Dry & Oily Work
body:
Cut and Abrasion-Resistant Gloves for Medium-Duty Tasks: A Breakdown

This description highlights gloves designed for medium-duty tasks, offering both cut and abrasion resistance while maintaining dexterity. Here's a breakdown of the key features and benefits:

  • Protection:
    • Cut Protection: The description mentions "enhanced cut protection," but the specific level isn't provided. Cut resistance is crucial for tasks involving sharp objects. Look for cut resistance ratings based on relevant standards (e.g., EN 388) to ensure adequate protection.
    • Abrasion Resistance: Nitrile foam coating generally offers good abrasion resistance against wear and tear from moderate contact with rough surfaces.

 

  • Dexterity and Comfort:
    • Nitrile Foam Coating: Compared to other coatings, nitrile foam can provide a good balance of grip, dexterity, and abrasion resistance.
    • Breathable and Seamless Liner: This design aims to provide a comfortable fit with good airflow, minimizing sweat build-up and allowing for better finger movement.

 

  • Applications:

These gloves could be suitable for various medium-duty tasks requiring:

    • Balanced Protection: A combination of cut and abrasion resistance for handling sharp objects or materials with moderate abrasive potential (e.g., sheet metal, lumber with occasional knots).
    • Dexterity: Tasks requiring good finger movement and control, like assembly work, packing, or operating tools.

body:

  • Protection:

  • Dexterity and Comfort:

  • Grip:

  • Applications:

These gloves could be suitable for various medium-duty tasks in dry environments that require:

    •  Balanced Protection: A combination of abrasion and cut resistance for handling rough objects and materials with some potential for cuts (e.g., construction work with lumber, handling metal with occasional sharp edges).

title: Ansell Edge 48-701: Cut, Abrasion & Oil-Resistant Gloves for Dry Environments
body:
Cut, Oil, and Abrasion-Resistant Gloves: Detailed Breakdown

This description highlights gloves designed for a triple threat: cuts, oil, and abrasion resistance, while offering good grip and comfort. Here's a breakdown of the key features and benefits:

  • Protection:
    • Cut Resistance: The description mentions "two levels of cut performance," but the specific levels aren't provided. This could be a valuable feature for tasks with varying cut hazards. Look for cut resistance ratings based on relevant standards (e.g., EN 388) to ensure adequate protection.
    • Abrasion Resistance: The palm PU (polyurethane) coating suggests good protection against wear and tear from rough surfaces.
    • Oil Resistance: PU coating offers some oil protection, but the level might vary depending on the specific PU formulation.

 

  • Dexterity and Comfort:
    • Seamless Liner and Knitted Wrist: This design aims to provide a comfortable fit with good flexibility for finger movement.

 

  • Grip:
    • Good Grip in Dry Conditions: PU coating offers good grip, but it might decrease in wet environments.

 

  • Applications:

These gloves could be suitable for various tasks requiring a combination of protections:

    • Multi-Hazard Environments: Construction, mechanics, metalworking, or other tasks involving cuts, oils, and abrasive materials.
    • Dexterity: Tasks requiring good finger movement and control, like using tools or assembling parts.

title: Ansell Edge 48-126: Comfortable & Abrasion-Resistant Gloves for Light-Duty Tasks
body:
Abrasion-Resistant Gloves with Durability, Grip, and Tactility: Breakdown

This description highlights abrasion-resistant gloves designed for a balance of durability, grip, tactility, and affordability. Here's a breakdown of the key features and benefits:

  • Abrasion Resistance:
    • The description mentions Abrasion Resistance, but no specific level or certification is provided. This makes it difficult to gauge how well they will withstand wear and tear.

 

  • Durability:
    • Black Exterior: Black color can help mask dirt, potentially extending the usable life of the gloves before needing cleaning.

 

  • Dexterity and Comfort:
    • Seamless Design: This aims to provide a close, comfortable fit with good finger movement.
    • 15-Gauge Polyester Liner: A 15-gauge liner indicates a relatively thin and flexible design, allowing for good tactility and dexterity.

 

  • Grip:
    • The description doesn't mention grip properties. Grip can be important for handling objects in Dry, Oily, or Wet Environments.

 

  • Affordability:
    • The description mentions "Economical Industrial Gloves," suggesting these gloves might be a Cost-Effective option.

 

  • Possible Applications:

These gloves could be suitable for various tasks requiring:

    • Light to Moderate Abrasion Protection: Handling rough or textured objects, light assembly work, or basic packing tasks (not heavy-duty abrasion).
    • Dexterity and Tactility: Tasks requiring good finger movement and a close feel, like sorting objects or basic machine operation.

title: Ansell Edge 14-663: Chemical & Oil-Resistant Gloves with Excellent Grip
body:
CE-Certified PVC Gloves: Breakdown for Chemical and Mechanical Resistance

This description highlights PVC gloves certified for safety and offering a combination of features for various industrial applications. Here's a breakdown:

  • Material and Protection:
    • PVC Coating: Polyvinyl Chloride (PVC) offers good resistance to many chemicals, including acids, bases, and oils (check the specific resistance chart for the intended chemicals).
    • CE-certified: This indicates compliance with European safety standards, ensuring a minimum level of quality and protection.

 

  • Grip and Dexterity:
    • Non-slip Finish: The rough surface texture can enhance grip, especially when handling wet or oily objects.
    • Note: PVC can sometimes have a stiff feel compared to other materials. Dexterity might be limited for tasks requiring high precision handling.

 

  • Applications:

These gloves could be suitable for various tasks requiring:

    • Chemical Resistance: Handling chemicals within the PVC's resistance range (always check the compatibility chart).
    • Mechanical Protection: PVC offers some protection against cuts, scrapes, and abrasion (although not as effective as some other materials).
    • Grip in Wet or Oily Environments: The non-slip finish can be beneficial for these conditions.

title: Ansell AlphaTec 58-435: Heavy-Duty Nitrile Gloves with Superior Grip & Chemical Resistance
body:
Heavy-Duty High-Dexterity Gloves with ANSELL GRIP™ Technology

This description highlights a pair of heavy-duty nitrile gloves designed for superior grip and handling in wet or oily environments, while maintaining dexterity. Here's a breakdown of the key features and benefits:

  • Grip and Dexterity:
    • ANSELL GRIP™ Technology: This proprietary technology by Ansell aims to enhance grip, especially in wet or oily conditions. This can be crucial for safe handling of greasy or wet components.
    • Unlined Nitrile Shell (0.7 mm/27 mil): The unlined design contributes to a thinner profile and potentially better finger movement compared to lined gloves. However, nitrile by itself offers good flexibility for a heavy-duty glove.

 

  • Protection:
    • Abrasion Resistance: The 0.7mm/27 mil nitrile shell offers optimized abrasion resistance. This can help protect hands from scrapes, scratches, and wear and tear during handling tasks.
    • Chemical Resistance: Nitrile is a common material for chemical resistant gloves. However, the description mentions "enhanced" chemical resistance, but the specific chemicals it resists are not mentioned. It's important to consult the manufacturer's information or a chemical resistance chart to ensure these gloves are suitable for the chemicals you'll be handling.

 

  • Applications:

 These gloves could be suitable for various heavy-duty tasks involving:

    • Wet or Oily Environments: The ANSELL GRIP™ technology and nitrile construction can be beneficial for tasks requiring good grip when handling greasy or wet parts (e.g., automotive repair, machinery maintenance).
    • Abrasion and Chemical Hazards: The abrasion resistance and nitrile material offer protection from scrapes, scratches, and some chemicals (depending on the specific type of nitrile used).

title: Ansell AlphaTec Solvex 37-675: Comfortable & Versatile Chemical-Resistant Gloves
body:
Breakdown of Thin, Versatile Chemical-Resistant Gloves

These gloves combine features for comfort, dexterity, and chemical protection for various applications. Here's a breakdown:

  • Material and Protection:
    • Nitrile Compound Composition: Nitrile offers good resistance to a range of chemicals, oils, and greases. However,
    • EN 374 Type A Chemical Resistance: This indicates the gloves meet a European standard for protection against specific chemicals (mainly alcohols, weak acids/bases, and some detergents). It's crucial to consult the EN 374 chart and the manufacturer's specifications to ensure these gloves are suitable for the chemicals you'll be handling.

 

  • Comfort and Dexterity:
    • Thin Design (15 mil/0.38 mm): This allows for a close fit and good finger movement, important for precise tasks.
    • Cotton Flocking: The cotton lining absorbs moisture, potentially improving comfort during extended wear. However, this lining might not be ideal for tasks requiring frequent cleaning or involving water-based chemicals.

 

  • Possible Applications:

These gloves could be suitable for various tasks requiring:

    • Light Chemical Handling:
    • Tasks involving chemicals listed under EN 374 Type A (e.g., alcohols, some detergents).
    • Remember to check the EN 374 chart and manufacturer's specifications for specific chemicals.
    • Good Dexterity: Assembly, mixing chemicals (of compatible types), precision cleaning tasks.

title: Ansell AlphaTec Solvex 37-676: Durable & Comfortable Chemical-Resistant Gloves
body:
Breakdown of Comfortable Chemical-Resistant Gloves

These gloves combine features for user comfort, grip, durability, and chemical protection. Here's a breakdown:

  • Material and Protection:
    • Tough Nitrile Compound: Nitrile offers good resistance to a range of chemicals, oils, and greases. However, the specific chemicals and the level of resistance will depend on the exact nitrile compound used.

 

  • Durability:
    • Tough Nitrile Compound: This generally translates to good durability for tasks involving exposure to chemicals and some abrasion.

 

  • Comfort and Dexterity:
    • Cotton Flocking: The cotton lining absorbs moisture, potentially improving comfort during extended wear. However, this lining might not be ideal for tasks requiring frequent cleaning or involving water-based chemicals.
    • Note: Cotton flocking can sometimes reduce finger movement slightly compared to unlined gloves.

 

  • Grip:
    • Reversed Lozenge Finish: This textured surface pattern can enhance grip, especially when handling wet or oily objects.

 

  • Possible Applications:

These gloves could be suitable for various tasks requiring:

    • Chemical Handling:
      • Look for additional information about the specific chemicals the nitrile compound resists. Consider consulting the manufacturer's chemical resistance chart.
    • Durability: Tasks involving moderate to heavy-duty chemical handling or potential contact with abrasive materials (e.g., cleaning with solvents, parts washing).

title: HILLSON-BESTON
body:
Comfortable and Durable Lining: Non-Woven Fabric with Polyamide Padding

This product description highlights the technical aspects of the lining material. Here's a breakdown focusing on the benefits for the user:

  • Enhanced Comfort: The non-woven fabric lining feels soft and comfortable against the skin.
  • Moisture Management: The lining effectively absorbs moisture and wicks it away from your feet, keeping them drier and cooler.
  • Durable Performance: This lining material is built to last, resisting wear and tear even in wet conditions.
  • Padded Polyamide Interior (optional): The added padding provides extra cushioning and comfort for all-day wear (if applicable).

 

Key Features:

  • Good moisture absorption and vaporization: Keeps feet dry and comfortable.
  • Rubbing resistance: Prevents irritation from friction.
  • High abrasion resistance: Durable and long-lasting, even in wet conditions.
  • (Optional) Padded polyamide interior: Enhances comfort with additional cushioning.

title: HILLSON-WORKLITE
body:
Breathable Comfort:

  • Flyknit Upper (1.6-1.8 mm thick): This lightweight, knitted upper provides a comfortable and breathable fit that conforms to your foot.

 

Supportive Lining:

  • Quarter Lining (Warp Knitted Fabric): Offers a supportive and structured feel around the ankle and heel area.
  • Vamp Lining (Foam Padded Textile): Provides additional cushioning and comfort in the front part of the shoe, where your foot meets the laces.
  • Tongue (High Density Foam Sandwiched Between Warp Knitted Fabric): The padded tongue distributes pressure evenly across the top of your foot for a comfortable fit and reduces lace bite.

title: HILLSON-STAMINA
body:
Durable and Supportive:

  • Genuine Leather Upper (1.80 mm - 2.00 mm thick): This high-quality leather provides a long-lasting, stylish look and offers good support for your feet.
  • Chromium VI free: Ensures safety regarding potential harmful chemicals.
  • Apollo Print (optional): Adds a unique design element to the shoe (if applicable).

 

Comfortable Fit:

  • Vamp Lining (High Tenacity Polyester Fiber): This lining is abrasion-resistant and durable, helping the shoe maintain its shape over time.
  • Quarter Lining (Air Mesh Fabric with PU Foam): This breathable mesh lining allows for air circulation and keeps your feet cool, while the PU foam padding provides added comfort and cushioning around your ankle.

 

Built to Last:

  • High Elongation and Tensile Nylon Thread: These strong threads ensure the shoes can withstand wear and tear without breaking easily.
  • Anti-Rust D-Eyelets: Prevent rust and ensure the laces stay securely fastened.

title: Men's Caterpillar Steel Toe Waterproof Work Boot P90935
body:
Men's Caterpillar Threshold Steel Toe Boot: Durable and Reliable Workwear

The Caterpillar Threshold Steel Toe work boot is a solid choice for men seeking a durable and protective boot for demanding jobs.

Safety and Protection:

  • ANSI/ASTM I75 & C75 Approved: Meets relevant safety standards for impact and puncture resistance (important to check the specific ratings for this model).
  • Steel Toe Cap: Protects toes from impacts up to a certain force rating (check specifications).

 

Durability and Performance:

  • Full-Grain Leather Upper: Provides long-lasting wear and tear resistance.
  • Seam-Sealed Waterproof Bootie: Keeps your feet dry in wet conditions.
  • Abrasion-Resistant Toe Bumper & Heel Counter: Offers additional protection for areas prone to wear and tear.
  • Molded EVA Footbed: Provides cushioning and comfort for all-day wear.
  • Nylon Shank: Offers arch support and stability.

 

Overall, this boot is a great option for construction workers, mechanics, or anyone who needs a reliable and protective work boot.

title: CATERPILLAR SHOES 717354
body:
Lightweight Comfort Meets Work Boot Protection: These Boots Have It All

These low-top work boots offer a unique combination of athletic style, comfort, and essential safety features, making them ideal for various work environments.

Key Features:

  • Sleek Design: Low-top profile with a streamlined athletic look provides a modern aesthetic.
  • Composite Safety Toe: Protects toes from impacts while being lighter than steel (important for some users who prioritize weight reduction).
  • Breathable Comfort: Nylon mesh uppers allow for airflow and keep your feet cool.
  • Durable Overlays: No-sew PU overlays offer additional structure and protection without compromising flexibility.
  • Lightweight Performance: ERGOlite design keeps the boots lightweight for reduced foot fatigue.
  • Shock Absorption: Dual-density EVA foam midsole provides cushioning and absorbs impact for all-day comfort.
  • ASTM F2413-11 Compliant Safety Toe: Meets safety standards for impact protection (refer to specific ratings for details).

title: Heavy-Duty Sewer Line Caution Tape: High Visibility & Safety
body:
Features and Benefits:

  • Underground Sewer Line Warning Tape (3 Inch Width)
    • Prevents Accidents: Brightly colored tape with clear "Caution Sewer Line" message alerts workers and excavators of buried sewer lines to avoid accidental damage.
    • High Visibility: Increases awareness and helps prevent costly repairs caused by digging into sewer lines.
    • Durable Material: Suitable for underground use and can withstand harsh weather conditions.

This tape is essential for marking underground sewer lines to promote safety and prevent disruptions during excavation projects.
